m_szDocTitle: GM: Fewer Than 2 Problems Per Million Battery Cells | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: GM: Fewer Than 2 Problems Per Million Battery Cells Originally published on EV Obsession . A study of Chevy Volt owners with vehicles featuring batteries supplied by LG Chem has found that there’s been nearly no loss of range/performance even after 3 years of ownership, according to the vice president of transmissions and electrification at GM, Larry Nitz. While that comment is noteworthy enough on its own, Nitz made several other very interesting comments as well, including this one: “We’ve seen what I would call pharmaceutical levels of quality in cell production.
